alert.note: Alert for Edwards; Kiowa; Pawnee; Pratt; Stafford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 10:09PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Kiowa, south central Pawnee, southwestern Stafford, Edwards and northwestern Pratt Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 1009 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Centerview, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Fellsburg around 1025 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Trousdale, Belpre and Hopewell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
